titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Pelig Eddy Letter : 1807 April 19, Providence (R.I.), to Thomas Eddy, Washington (N.C.),

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.unittitle: Pelig Eddy letter : Providence (R.I.), to Thomas Eddy, Washington (N.C.),
did.abstract: Written by Thomas Eddy's father, Pelig Eddy, with a note added by his sister, Mary Eddy. Contains news about their family and mutual acquaintances in Providence, Rhode Island and expresses concern for Eddy's health. Apparently, Eddy was on business in North Carolina.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Pelig Eddy letter : 1807 April 19, Providence (R.I.), to Thomas Eddy, Washington (N.C.),, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using a crosswalk defined in marc2ead_sectionA.xsl. The finding aid was generated as part of a larger project to digitize several thousand small collections housed in Section A, September 2018.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Written by Thomas Eddy's father, Pelig Eddy, with a note added by his sister, Mary Eddy. Contains news about their family and mutual acquaintances in Providence, Rhode Island and expresses concern for Eddy's health. Apparently, Eddy was on business in North Carolina.

did.unittitle: Pelig Eddy letter : Providence (R.I.), to Thomas Eddy, Washington (N.C.),
